text: John "Twiggy" Williams (born September 19, 1942) was a Canadian football player who played for the Calgary Stampeders, Hamilton Tiger-Cats, Edmonton Eskimos and Toronto Argonauts. He won the Grey Cup with Hamilton in 1972. Williams played college football at the University of New Mexico.http://www.justsportsstats.com/footballstatsindex.php?player_id=willijoh006 His son, John Williams also played in the CFL. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:American players of Canadian football Category:Sportspeople from Fort Worth, Texas Category:Calgary Stampeders players Category:Hamilton Tiger-Cats players Category:Edmonton Eskimos players Category:Toronto Argonauts players Category:New Mexico Lobos football players Category:Canadian football defensive backs Category:Grey Cup champions Category:Players of American football from Texas Category:American football defensive backs
title: John Williams (defensive back)
